DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety pharmacokinetics HL068 ( Candesartan 16 mg Amlodipine 10mg ) coadministration two separate drug healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study ( Candesartan 16 mg Amlodipine 10 mg )
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 19 55 year old . Body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 27.0 kg/m2 Understand requirement study voluntarily consent participate study . Previous history present clinically significant digestive , cardiovascular , respiratory , psychiatric , endocrine , hepatobiliary , renal disease . History gastrointestinal disease gastrointestinal surgery affect drug absorption . Subjects hereditary problem , example , galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption . Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range . Especially , ASTor ALT > 1.5 time Upper Normal Limit total bilirubin > 1.5 time Upper Normal Limit Positive test result Hepatitis B antibody , Hepatitis C virus antibody , Syphilis regain test Participation clinical investigation within 3 month prior study drug administration Subjects whole blood donation within 60 day component blood donation within 30days blood transfusion within 30days prior first dosing . SBP ≥ 140 mmHg < 115 mmHg , DBP ≥ 90 mmHg < 70 mmHg Caffeine > 400mg/day Alcohol > 30g/day Cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day . Subjects judge unsuitable investigator
